code: var SET_PERIOD='SET-PERIOD';var initialState='2019';var periodReducer=function periodReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;if(action.type===SET_PERIOD){state.period=action.period;console.log("SET-PERIOD="+action.period);}return state;};export var setPeriodCreator=function setPeriodCreator(text){return{type:SET_PERIOD,period:text};};export default periodReducer;
